data.name: Mob Psycho 100: Idiots Only Event ~Kin~
data.short_description: After the incident with the religious organization (LOL), the evil spirit, Dimple, keeps following Mob around. Also, because of the incident, Mezato Ichi from the school paper starts following around Mob, as well. Then one day, another student joins the Body Improvement Club.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
